page.description: Properties and methods that can be used to interact with the Tabbed UI using JavaScript.

discussion.p: The TabbedUI component has several methods you can use for interacting with the component using JavaScript. To call a method, use the *[js:tbiObj]* object in your JavaScript. The *[js:tbiObj]* is the JavaScript object corresponding to the TabbedUI. For example:

p.example: var currentIndex = tbiObj.getCurrentPaneIndex(); alert("The current pane index is " + currentIndex);
